::: {.unit-reading}
# Reading

## Installation options

You can install Python from python.org or use a distribution like Anaconda. Choose one path and keep it consistent.

## Verify your install

Open a terminal and run python --version to confirm the install. Start the REPL with python and exit with exit().

## Environments

Python environments keep dependencies isolated by project. You can use venv or conda to create and activate environments.

## Keep Python updated

Update Python occasionally to keep security fixes and new features. Be aware that major version changes can require package updates.

::: 
<!-- end unit-reading div -->
